title: WebSockets communication is slow in my machine
description: The WebSockets communication used under the covers by SignalR looks like is going slow in my development machine..

title: Entity Framework crashes
description: When connecting to the database, EF is crashing

title: Missing analyzer for methods with PlatformNotSupportedException body
description: In .NET5 new attributes were introduced to support CA1416 analyzer rule to detect when unsupported APIs are called. To make the analyzer more effective existing libraries need to annotate their code with UnsupportedOSPlatformAttribute or SupportedOSPlatformAttribute for the analyzer to be able to work.
